KA.EP.content: democracy refers to who can hold the highest power > republic refers to method by which people are governed (republicanism: principle acc. which executive power separated from legislative power) > autocracy (princes), aristocracy (nobility), or democracy (people), these can either be republican or despotic [save democracy, which is always despotic]
